My reasons for me being in the top 5
5% hit rate

I lag so there is a 5 second delay
I don't have optifine so I go all vanilla on some people
I bow best with a sword

replies.body:
at longshots he is. 
But you are right, there are archers better at him when it comes to bowspamming and close-mid range. 
He gets more credit though because (generally) longer shots are harder to aim and predict the trajectory.
